Released 2025, August 07BodyDimensions: 163.7 x 75.9 x 8.2 mm (6.44 x 2.99 x 0.32 in) Weight: 212 g (7.48 oz) SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM IP Rating: IP65 dust tight and water resistant (low pressure water jets)DisplayType: AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, HDR, 4320Hz PWM, 2000 nits (HBM), 5500 nits (peak) Size: 6.78 inches, 111.0 cm² (~89.3% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution: 1260 x 2800 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~453 ppi density)PlatformOS: Android 15, OriginOS 5 Chipset: Mediatek Dimensity 9400+ (3 nm) CPU: Octa-core (1x3.73 GHz Cortex-X925 & 3x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4x2.4 GHz Cortex-A720) GPU: Immortalis-G925MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 256GB 12GB RAM, 256GB 16GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM, 512GB 16GB RAM UFS 4.1Main CameraDual: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS 8 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide) Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K, 1080p, gyro-EIS, OISSelfie CameraSingle: 16 MP, f/2.5, (wide), 1/3.0", 1.0µm Video: 1080p@30fps, gyro-EISSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers 3.5mm jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual-band Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, LHDC 5 Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1C+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5), GLONASS NFC: Yes Infrared port: Yes Radio: No USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGFeaturesSensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBatteryType: Si/C Li-Ion 8000 mAh Charging: 90W wired, 55W PD/PPS Reverse wired chargingMiscColors: White, Gray, Gold Models: V2507ASmartphone DescriptionLaunched in August 2025, this flagship smartphone combines powerful performance, an immersive display, and a massive battery for an all-round premium experience. It features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with HDR, 144Hz refresh rate, and an impressive peak brightness of 5500 nits, ensuring crystal-clear visibility whether indoors or under direct sunlight.Powered by the cutting-edge Mediatek Dimensity 9400+ (3nm) chipset, an advanced Octa-core CPU, and Immortalis-G925 GPU, this device delivers seamless multitasking and high-end gaming performance.For photography, it comes with a dual rear camera setup—a 50MP wide sensor (with OIS) and an 8MP ultrawide lens. The 16MP front camera captures detailed selfies and supports 1080p video with gyro-EIS for added stability. It also supports 4K video recording with excellent detail and smoothness.Battery life is one of its strongest points, packing a massive 8000 mAh Li-Ion cell with 90W wired fast charging and 55W PD/PPS support, ensuring hours of usage with just a short charge.Additional highlights include stereo speakers, under-display fingerprint sensor, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, and an infrared port.The device is available in White, Gray, and Gold color options, with model number V2507A.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. Realme 12The Realme 12 is a cutting-edge smartphone that combines advanced technology with sleek design. Powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset, it delivers remarkable performance, catering to both casual users and tech enthusiasts. With a stunning 6.72-inch display, an impressive camera system, and 5G capabilities, the Realme 12 stands out as an exceptional choice in its segment.Features of Realme 12The Realme 12 boasts a 6.72-inch IPS LCD display with 1080 x 2400 resolution, powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset and 8GB RAM for seamless performance. Its 108 MP dual rear camera and 8 MP front camera capture stunning photos and videos, while the 5000 mAh battery with 45W fast charging keeps you powered all day. With 5G connectivity, 256GB storage, and advanced features like a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, the Realme 12 delivers cutting-edge technology in a sleek and lightweight design.Immersive 6.72-inch IPS LCD DisplayThe Realme 12 features a 6.72-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. This ensures vivid colors and sharp details, making it ideal for streaming videos, gaming, and browsing. The expansive screen offers a seamless viewing experience, whether you're enjoying your favorite shows or engaging in intense gaming sessions.Powerful Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ ChipsetUnder the hood, the Realme 12 is powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset, built on a 6nm architecture. Its octa-core CPU, featuring 2x2.2 GHz Cortex-A76 and 6x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 cores, ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance. Paired with the Mali-G57 MC2 GPU, it handles graphics-intensive tasks effortlessly, providing a lag-free experience for gamers and professionals alike.Massive 8GB RAM and 256GB StorageWith 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, the Realme 12 offers ample space for all your apps, photos, and files. Whether you're a multitasker or a media hoarder, this smartphone has got you covered. Say goodbye to storage constraints and enjoy fast, seamless app performance.108 MP AI-Powered Dual Rear CameraCapture life’s best moments with the Realme 12's 108 MP main camera, equipped with PDAF and an f/1.8 aperture for stunning clarity and detail. Complemented by a 2 MP depth sensor, this dual-camera setup delivers vibrant photos with natural bokeh effects. The device also supports 1080p video recording, making it perfect for content creators. The 8 MP front camera ensures clear and beautiful selfies, enhancing your social media presence.All-Day Battery with 45W Fast ChargingThe Realme 12 comes equipped with a 5000 mAh battery that keeps you powered throughout the day. Whether you're working, gaming, or streaming, you won't have to worry about running out of juice. The 45W fast charging capability ensures you can get back to 100% in no time, keeping up with your dynamic lifestyle.Seamless Connectivity and Advanced FeaturesThis smartphone supports dual SIM with 5G connectivity, ensuring ultra-fast internet speeds for uninterrupted streaming and browsing. With Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.2, and USB Type-C 2.0, you get a versatile and future-ready device. The side-mounted fingerprint sensor and other advanced sensors like accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass enhance security and functionality.

The main camera supports 4K@120fps ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, and 3D (spatial) video/audio recording, while the 18MP selfie camera with PDAF, OIS, and SL 3D biometric sensor ensures stunning selfies and secure Face ID functionality.Battery performance varies by model – 4832 mAh (Nano-SIM version) and 5088 mAh (eSIM-only version). The device supports PD3.2 fast charging (50% in 20 minutes), 25W MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging (50% in 30 minutes, 15W in China), and 4.5W reverse wired charging.Extra features include Face ID, Ultra Wideband (Gen2), Emergency SOS & Find My via satellite, Apple Pay, and IP68 dust/water resistance (up to 6m for 30 minutes).

No returns will be applicable in case of a change of mind. If the ordered color is not in stock, the seller will be obliged to provide another color; no returns will be applicable in this field. In an accidental case, mobile devices (Broken Display, Dent, Burn, shock, Water damage, manual update, or Root) void the warranty. 0% EMI available. As the product's price is volatile, the cost of any product may change at any moment aligned with the market price. Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro Full DescriptionThe iPhone 17 Pro represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, bringing together elegant design, cutting-edge performance, and advanced camera technology. Crafted with a refined aluminum alloy frame and protected by the new Ceramic Shield 2, it combines strength and sophistication while remaining slim and lightweight. With 5G support across global bands, ultra-fast performance from the Apple A19 Pro chip, and breakthrough imaging capabilities, the iPhone 17 Pro is built for those who demand the very best.OverviewThe 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display delivers breathtaking visuals with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and peak brightness up to 3000 nits for unmatched clarity even under direct sunlight. Powered by iOS 26 and the 3nm Apple A19 Pro chipset, it ensures smooth multitasking, console-level gaming, and professional-grade editing on the go. Storage options range up to 1TB, paired with 12GB RAM, providing ample space and seamless performance for both everyday use and demanding workflows.Photography and videography reach new heights with the advanced triple 48MP camera system, featuring wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses with up to 4x optical zoom. The addition of a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner enhances depth mapping and low-light performance, while video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 2, and even immersive 3D spatial video. The front-facing 18MP multi-aspect camera with OIS and ProRes support ensures professional-quality selfies and video calls.The iPhone 17 Pro also introduces faster and more reliable connectivity, supporting Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS with multi-band systems including NavIC, and emergency satellite communication. A robust battery ensures all-day power, supported by fast 50% charging in just 20 minutes with wired PD2.0 or 30 minutes with MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging.Key Features 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and Dolby VisionApple A19 Pro chipset with 12GB RAM and up to 1TB storageTriple 48MP pro camera system with periscope telephoto and 3D LiDAR scanner18MP multi-aspect front camera with OIS, Dolby Vision HDR, and ProRes RAWAdvanced video capabilities including 4K 120fps, Apple Log 2, and spatial videoDual-SIM options with global 5G band support including mmWave (USA)Rugged build with Ceramic Shield 2, IP68 water resistance, and anti-reflective coatingWi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort supportAll-day battery with fast wired and wireless charging, plus reverse wired chargingAvailable in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue

details.description_text: The Nokia C22 phone has a dual-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 13MP, 2MP camera. It has an 8MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (2/3GB/64GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support microSD up to 512GB on uses a dedicated slot. Certainly, C22 has a 5000mAh battery with 10W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, C22 is 2G/3G/4G supportable.Mode Nokia c22WiFiWi-Fi 802.11 b/g/nBluetooth5.2, A2DPUSBUSB Type-C 2.0GPSYes with a GPSFm RadioYesFeaturesSensorsFingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, proximityMessagingYesBatteryBattery TypeNon-removable Li-Po BatteryBattery Capacity5000 mAhCharging10W WiredMoreBody ColorSand, Midnight Black

Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a smartphone that runs on Android 14 HyperOS. It was released on 2024, April 10. Redmi Turbo 3 has 6.67 inch, AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 2400 nits (peak), a resolution of 1220 x 2712 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus. It uses Qualcomm SM8635 Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×3.0 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4×2.8 GHz Cortex-A720 & 3×2.0 GHz Cortex-A520) CPU, Adreno 735 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 2MP Single selfie camera. Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 uses Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable battery.Design & Materials:One of the standout features of the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is its stunning design and premium materials. The smartphone boasts a sleek and elegant look, with a large OLED display measuring 6.67 inches and a resolution of 1200×2712 (QHD). The screen also offers a refresh rate of 120 Hz, ensuring smooth and fluid transitions while scrolling or gaming. With a peak brightness of 2400 cd/m² and support for HDR10+, it delivers vibrant colors and sharp contrast for an immersive viewing experience.In terms of audio, this mobile comes equipped with stereo speakers, Hi-Res Audio, and Dolby Atmos support, allowing users to enjoy rich and immersive sound quality. The smartphone features a mix of glass and leather materials, giving it a premium look and feel. The front and back are protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus, ensuring durability and scratch resistance. With an impressive usable surface of 88.5%, the Redmi Turbo 3 maximizes screen real estate for an enhanced user experience.Hardware:Under the hood, the Redmi Turbo 3 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen3 processor, built on a 4nm architecture for lightning-fast performance. The smartphone is available in two RAM configurations – 12GB and 16GB, utilizing LPDDR5X technology for seamless multitasking and smooth app performance. Users can choose between three storage options – 256GB, 512GB, and a massive 1TB, all using UFS Storage 4.0 for lightning-fast read and write speeds.The Turbo 3 excels in benchmarks, scoring an impressive 1754299 on AnTuTu version 10. Security is also a top priority, with a fingerprint display for secure and convenient unlocking. To ensure optimal performance, this phone features a robust cooling system, including a 4800mm² ultra-large area ice circulation cold pump to prevent overheating during demanding tasks.Camera:The smartphone features a dual-camera setup, with a primary camera sporting a Sony LYT-600 sensor with 50.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/1.6 for stunning photos in any lighting condition. The wide-angle lens uses a Sony IMX355 sensor with 8.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/2.2, allowing users to capture expansive landscapes with ease. On the front, Turbo 3 houses a selfie camera with an Omnivision OV20B sensor, 20.0 megapixels, and an aperture of f/2.0.Additional camera features include optical stabilization (OIS) for shake-free videos, 4K video recording for crystal-clear footage, and even 8K video capabilities for capturing every detail in high resolution.Connectivity:The smartphone supports Bluetooth 5.4 for seamless wireless connectivity, dual SIM functionality for added flexibility, NFC for mobile payments, WiFi 6 (802.11ax) for fast and stable internet connections, GPS (L1+L5) for accurate location tracking, and even an infrared port for controlling compatible devices.Battery:Powering the Xiaomi Turbo 3 is a massive 5000mAh battery, ensuring long-lasting performance for all-day use. The smartphone also supports fast charging up to 90.0W, allowing users to quickly top up their devices and get back to their day without interruption.Overall, the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a standout smartphone that offers a compelling mix of design, performance, and affordability. With its premium materials, powerful hardware, impressive camera capabilities, and robust connectivity options, the Redmi Turbo 3 is sure to impress even the most discerning smartphone users.

With a peak brightness of 2400 cd/m² and support for HDR10+, it delivers vibrant colors and sharp contrast for an immersive viewing experience.In terms of audio, this mobile comes equipped with stereo speakers, Hi-Res Audio, and Dolby Atmos support, allowing users to enjoy rich and immersive sound quality. The smartphone features a mix of glass and leather materials, giving it a premium look and feel. The front and back are protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus, ensuring durability and scratch resistance. With an impressive usable surface of 88.5%, the Redmi Turbo 3 maximizes screen real estate for an enhanced user experience.Hardware:Under the hood, the Redmi Turbo 3 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen3 processor, built on a 4nm architecture for lightning-fast performance. The smartphone is available in two RAM configurations – 12GB and 16GB, utilizing LPDDR5X technology for seamless multitasking and smooth app performance. Users can choose between three storage options – 256GB, 512GB, and a massive 1TB, all using UFS Storage 4.0 for lightning-fast read and write speeds.The Turbo 3 excels in benchmarks, scoring an impressive 1754299 on AnTuTu version 10. Security is also a top priority, with a fingerprint display for secure and convenient unlocking. To ensure optimal performance, this phone features a robust cooling system, including a 4800mm² ultra-large area ice circulation cold pump to prevent overheating during demanding tasks.Camera:The smartphone features a dual-camera setup, with a primary camera sporting a Sony LYT-600 sensor with 50.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/1.6 for stunning photos in any lighting condition. The wide-angle lens uses a Sony IMX355 sensor with 8.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/2.2, allowing users to capture expansive landscapes with ease. On the front, Turbo 3 houses a selfie camera with an Omnivision OV20B sensor, 20.0 megapixels, and an aperture of f/2.0.Additional camera features include optical stabilization (OIS) for shake-free videos, 4K video recording for crystal-clear footage, and even 8K video capabilities for capturing every detail in high resolution.Connectivity:The smartphone supports Bluetooth 5.4 for seamless wireless connectivity, dual SIM functionality for added flexibility, NFC for mobile payments, WiFi 6 (802.11ax) for fast and stable internet connections, GPS (L1+L5) for accurate location tracking, and even an infrared port for controlling compatible devices.Battery:Powering the Xiaomi Turbo 3 is a massive 5000mAh battery, ensuring long-lasting performance for all-day use. The smartphone also supports fast charging up to 90.0W, allowing users to quickly top up their devices and get back to their day without interruption.Overall, the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a standout smartphone that offers a compelling mix of design, performance, and affordability. With its premium materials, powerful hardware, impressive camera capabilities, and robust connectivity options, the Redmi Turbo 3 is sure to impress even the most discerning smartphone users.

Key Features of the Redmi Note 14Stunning Display and Modern DesignThe Redmi Note 14 boasts an impressive FHD+ display that offers vibrant colors and sharp resolution. Whether you're watching videos, browsing the web, or playing games, the display delivers a rich visual experience that’s hard to beat at this price point.In terms of design, the phone has a sleek and ergonomic build, making it comfortable to hold and use. Its modern design gives it a premium look without the premium price tag.Performance and EfficiencyUnder the hood, the Redmi Note 14 is powered by a MediaTek chipset, which ensures smooth and efficient performance across various tasks. Whether you're browsing, streaming, or multitasking, the phone handles everything with ease, ensuring you won’t experience lag or slowdowns.The device also excels in multitasking, with enough processing power to handle several apps running simultaneously, providing a fluid user experience.Camera QualityThe dual-camera setup of the Redmi Note 14 is equipped with AI enhancements that deliver crisp and vibrant photos. The camera adjusts settings automatically to ensure you capture great shots in various lighting conditions.For selfie lovers, the front-facing camera is built to capture high-quality selfies, making sure your social media game stays on point.Long-Lasting Battery LifeA key selling point of the Redmi Note 14 is its 5000mAh battery, which can last through a full day of heavy use. You won’t have to worry about running out of juice during your daily activities, whether you’re using the phone for work or entertainment.With fast charging technology, the Redmi Note 14 also allows you to recharge quickly, ensuring you’re always ready to go without long waits.Storage and Memory OptionsThe Redmi Note 14 offers flexible storage and RAM options, so you can choose a configuration that suits your needs. Whether you need more storage for photos, videos, and apps, or additional RAM for smooth multitasking, this device has you covered.Software and User InterfaceRunning on MIUI 15, the latest version of Xiaomi’s user-friendly interface, the Redmi Note 14 offers an intuitive and customizable experience. With features designed to improve usability and enhance security, MIUI 15 ensures a smooth and enjoyable user experience.

This thing packs a gorgeous 6.67-inch P-OLED screen that's smoother than your morning coffee with its 144Hz refresh rate, plus it gets bright enough to blind your enemies at 1600 nits. The Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset keeps everything snappy whether you're doom-scrolling TikTok or actually being productive, while that chunky 5500mAh battery laughs at your heavy usage habits.The 50MP camera with optical stabilization means even your butter fingers can capture crisp shots, and the ultrawide lens saves you from those awkward "everyone squeeze in" moments. Wrapped in eco-leather that feels surprisingly premium and built tough enough to survive your clumsiest days with IP68 protection, this phone basically dares you to find a better deal. It's running Android 15 fresh out the box, ready to be your reliable daily driver without breaking the bank. Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. IntroductionApple’s iPhone 16 is here, and it’s already making waves in the smartphone world. As the latest addition to Apple’s iconic lineup, the iPhone 16 brings a fresh set of features, refined design, and powerful performance that aims to elevate the user experience. But what makes the iPhone 16 stand out, and is it worth considering as your next smartphone? In this article, we’ll explore everything you need to know about the iPhone 16, from its key features and design to its price and availability in Bangladesh.Apple iPhone 16The iPhone 16 is more than just an upgrade; it represents Apple’s commitment to pushing the boundaries of smartphone technology. With a sleek design, upgraded camera system, and the latest in processing power, the iPhone 16 sets a new standard for what a smartphone can be. It’s built for those who demand performance, style, and the latest tech at their fingertips.Design and Build QualityApple has once again refined its design philosophy with the iPhone 16. The device features a stunning glass back and aluminum frame, providing both elegance and durability. Available in an array of new colors such as Midnight, Starlight, Blue, and Pink, the iPhone 16 caters to different tastes, making it not just a phone but a fashion statement.The iPhone 16 is also slightly thinner and lighter than its predecessor, making it more comfortable to hold and use. Its Ceramic Shield front cover offers extra protection against scratches and drops, ensuring your phone looks great even after daily use.Display: Vivid and ImmersiveThe iPhone 16 sports a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, which is perfect for watching videos, playing games, or just browsing the web. The OLED panel delivers sharp, vibrant colors with deep blacks, providing an immersive viewing experience. True Tone technology adjusts the display to match the lighting around you, making it easier on the eyes in any environment.Performance: Powered by the A17 Bionic ChipUnder the hood, the iPhone 16 is powered by Apple’s latest A17 Bionic chip, which offers industry-leading performance. With a 6-core CPU, 5-core GPU, and a 16-core Neural Engine, this chip handles everything from gaming and video editing to AI-driven tasks with remarkable speed and efficiency. Whether you’re multitasking between apps or running intensive games, the iPhone 16 delivers smooth, lag-free performance.Camera: Capture Life in Stunning DetailThe iPhone 16 features a dual-camera setup, consisting of a 48MP main sensor and a 12MP ultra-wide lens. The improved camera system allows for stunning photos and videos, even in challenging lighting conditions. New computational photography features enhance every shot, making colors more vibrant and details crisper.Night mode has been improved, allowing for brighter and clearer photos in low-light situations, while the Smart HDR 5 enhances photos by balancing highlights and shadows perfectly. Video enthusiasts will appreciate the enhanced 4K video recording capabilities, with improved stabilization for smoother footage.Battery Life and Charging: Stay Powered All DayBattery life is always a key concern, and Apple has made sure the iPhone 16 delivers. With an improved battery that supports up to 20 hours of video playback, you can use your phone throughout the day without constantly searching for a charger. The device supports fast charging, allowing you to get up to 50% charge in just 30 minutes with an appropriate adapter. MagSafe wireless charging is also available, making it convenient to charge your phone without plugging in.Software: iOS 17 for a Seamless ExperienceThe iPhone 16 runs on iOS 17, Apple’s latest operating system, which brings a host of new features and improvements. With more customizable home screens, enhanced widgets, and improved privacy controls, iOS 17 offers a more personal and secure experience. New accessibility features make the phone even easier to use for everyone, and seamless integration with other Apple devices keeps your digital life in sync.5G Connectivity and Advanced Wireless FeaturesThe iPhone 16 is equipped with 5G capabilities, ensuring faster internet speeds, lower latency, and a more reliable connection. Whether you’re streaming videos, playing online games, or making video calls, 5G connectivity keeps you connected with minimal lag. Wi-Fi 6E support further enhances wireless performance, making your internet connection faster and more stable.Enhanced Security and Privacy FeaturesApple continues to prioritize user security with the iPhone 16. Face ID has been improved for faster and more accurate facial recognition, making it easy to unlock your phone, access secure apps, and make payments safely. iOS 17 also includes advanced privacy settings that give you more control over your data, keeping your personal information secure from prying eyes.Storage Options to Fit Your NeedsThe iPhone 16 comes in three storage options: 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB. This range ensures that there’s a model to suit every need, whether you’re a casual user who mainly uses cloud storage or someone who needs extra space for photos, videos, and apps.Durability and Water ResistanceWith an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, the iPhone 16 is built to withstand the elements. Whether you accidentally drop it in water or get caught in the rain, your device is protected against damage. The toughened glass and Ceramic Shield front cover add an extra layer of durability, ensuring your phone can handle everyday wear and tear.Where to Buy the iPhone 16 in BangladeshIf you’re looking to buy the iPhone 16 in Bangladesh, it’s important to purchase from trusted sources to ensure you receive a genuine product with a valid warranty. Sumash Tech, known as an authentic mobile, laptop, and gadget shop, is one of the best places to buy Apple products in Bangladesh. They offer genuine devices with official warranties, providing you with peace of mind with your purchase.Is the iPhone 16 Worth It?The iPhone 16 offers a fantastic balance of design, performance, and features, making it an excellent choice for anyone in the market for a new smartphone. It’s perfect for those who want a powerful device that doesn’t compromise on style or functionality. While it might not have all the advanced features of the Pro models, the iPhone 16 provides a premium experience at a more accessible price point.ConclusionThe iPhone 16 is a testament to Apple’s ability to deliver high-quality smartphones that cater to a wide audience. With its beautiful design, powerful performance, and advanced camera system, it’s a great choice for anyone looking to upgrade their phone. For those in Bangladesh, the iPhone 16 is available at competitive prices, making it an attractive option in the current smartphone market.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.SpecificationBrandMotorolaModelEdge 60 Fusion 5GNetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GDimensions161 x 73 x 8.0 mm or 8.3 mm | IP68/IP69 dust/water resistant (high-pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min) | Corning Gorilla Glass 7i | Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), silicone polymer back (eco leather)Weight180 gSIMNano-SIM + eSIMDisplay TypeLTPO P-OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, 4500 nits (peak) | Corning Gorilla Glass 7iDisplay Size6.67 inchesDisplay Resolution1220 x 2712 pixelsOSAndroid 15ChipsetMediaTek Dimensity 7400CPUOcta-coreMemory256GB 8GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM | UFS 2.2Main Camera50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), dual pixel PDAF, OIS | 13 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide), AF | LED flash, HDR, panorama | 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240fps, gyro-EISSelfie Camera32 MP, f/2.2, (wide) | HDR | 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps, gyro-EISSoundStereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)Battery InfoLi-Po 5500 mAh | Non-removable | 68W wired chargingSensorsFingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassDescription Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5GThe Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5G is what happens when sleek design meets solid performance. That 6.7-inch LTPO P-OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate? Smooth. The curved edges? Comfortable without feeling flimsy. And the 50MP main camera with OIS? Sharp, even when the lighting isn’t on your side. Under the hood, you’ve got a Dimensity chipset that keeps things fast without unnecessary gimmicks. 5G ensures you’re not stuck waiting. TurboPower charging gets you back in action quickly. And with near-stock Android, you’re not drowning in pre-installed junk. It’s a phone that does what it’s supposed to without the unnecessary fluff. Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5G FeatureCombination of tough glass front and eco-leather back, so it’s as stylish as it is durableWith a massive 6.67-inch LTPO OLED display, your viewing experience will be smoothThe 50 MP main sensor is perfect for those sharp and detailed shotsEnhanced with OIS and dual pixel PDAF, your shots stay sharp even in low light.Record 4K video without breaking a sweat with gyro-EISThe 32 MP front camera ensures you’ll look your best in every shotFrom 0 to full in no time, so you spend more time using the phone and less time waiting.
